entities.name: polyjuice potion
entities.description: A potion that can change one's appearance to match another person. It is mentioned as being used by the imposter to keep the real Moody close.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A wizard who is known for drinking from his hip flask. He is also referred to as 'the real Moody'.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts who recognizes the imposter and explains how he was using Polyjuice Potion.

entities.name: hip flask
entities.description: A container that Moody uses to drink from.

relationships.description: Dumbledore recognizes the real Moody and explains how he was using Polyjuice Potion.
The imposter used Polyjuice Potion to change his appearance to match the real Moody.
